item.title: Senior Cloud Security Engineer Roadmap
item.description:
The whole roadmap will take about 2 to 3 months depending on how much time you dedicate

  • Build and get hands on Multi Cloud Projects as more companies are adopting Multi cloud approach, and having an understanding of each of the major clouds will set you apart
  • AI Security upskilling, you need to be aware of what AI capabilities all of the major cloud platforms have.
  • Business Specific Threat detection, you need to learn to build threat detections for business specific needs and prioritizing them
  • Integrating with Existing Cybersecurity Products, for every threat you identify in your cloud security tool, there is an angle of risk, compliance, security operations and what not
    • What detection gaps you have
    • Integrate existing security products
  • Mindset should be more of how do you complete efficient and robust products, and not merely focusing on completing tasks
  • Building Security Automation, leverage IaC and CI/CD to automate your tasks
  • Soft Skills, You need to be able to communicate with a wide range of teams in order to collaborate and expand
  • Working on Real Cloud Security Projects with Other Senior

Azure Security Assessments using Resource Graph Explorer
